lead_paragraph: The Courier and Enquirer declares its "belief" in the Compromise of 1850. Whether it is just what it should have been in all its details, The Courier will not say; but "it is, what it is, and cannot, without destroying it, be made otherwise." It was, to all intents, a "covenant:"
